description:
The Mega Jul is versatile and robust belay/rappel device.

  • Robust stainless steel construction for longevity
  • Good braking performance, yet you can pay out rope fast to keep up with the leader by holding the device open with your thumb
  • Configuration allows belaying a leader or bringing up 2 seconds
  • Small eyelet takes a carabiner to release the unit when bringing up a partner
name: Edelrid Mega Jul Belay Device
